channel.title: [634] Blocking teleports past 20 wild
channel.description: I'm trying to stop all teleports(including commands such as ::home,::edge, etc) after level 20 wild. How can I add this?

item.title: [634] Blocking teleports past 20 wild
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Find the method that handles teleporting [Hint: Check a magic class if your source has one] and add a conditional that causes it to not work if the user is past 20 wild. You will have to manually find the X and Y coordinates of the area that is the wild above level 20.

E.G.

if (getX > #### && getX < #### && getY > #### && getY < ####) return;

Replace the getX with whatever method your source uses to get the players current X position and the #### with the X and Y coordinates of the edges of the plane that is the wildy above level 20.
Then insert that into whatever method(s) handle teleporting.

Read full topic
